name: stat
description: A plugin that provides statistical information about a file, e.g. its size, owner, creation date, last modified date, and metadata change date.

process.description: Get statistical information about a file.

filePath.description: The path to the file to be analyzed.

fileSize.description: The size of the file in bytes.

fileCreated.description: The creation date of the file.

fileModified.description: The last modified date of the file.

fileMetadataChanged.description: The date when the file's metadata was last changed.

installed.description: Check if the stat plugin is installed and available for use.
Indicates whether the stat plugin is installed.

install.description: Install the stat plugin if it is not already installed.

success.description: Indicates whether the stat plugin was successfully installed.

message.description: Human-readable status message describing the installation result.
